# This file guides language models to our documentation.

# Configurations and Settings

# Key Modules and Tools
# timeframe_scheduler.py - Production timeframe scheduler for automated trading workflows
# - CLI commands: tfw/wtf - Wait for trading timeframes then execute scripts/functions
# - Supports all timeframes: m1, m5, m15, H1, H4, D1, W1, M1
# - Essential for cron-like orchestration in trading automation
